title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.9 - Heating of engines to be by approved means only
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.9 - Heating of engines to be by approved means only

State Regulations

The heating of engines at the air terminal shall be done
only by the use of steam, hot water, hot air or approved electric
heaters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1272.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
